page.title: 15Mrs.Mary Whitehouse V.A.L.A.
page.content: Interview with{MRS MARY WHITEHOUSE} President of the {VIEWERS AND {LISTENERS ASSOCIATION.} INT. Why are you famous? { {M.W. For twenty years I have {campaigned against too much {violence,bad language and indecency.} {in the media.} INT. What is the V.A.L.A? {M.W.People who have joined because {they care about these things. INT. What good has V.A.L.A. done? {M.W. It has got 3 Acts of Parliament} { 1) The Indecent Display Act.} { 2) The Child Protection Act. { 3) Video Recording Act.} INT.How long do you think you can continue?{ {M.W.As long as I live. } INT.What will happen when you stop? {M.W.Others will carry on.
